ai-tha-ap355:1.2_0: one should not raise joined palms to him.
ai-tha-ap355:2.3_0: I’m not aware of any bad places
ai-tha-ap355:3.1_0: Attaining the four kinds of textual analysis
ai-tha-ap355:4.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Bhūmajaka.
ai-tha-ap355:5.1_0: What is a third part of the senior monks?
